main event: A UFO was observed in Neosho, Missouri, on 19 August 1957, performing a whirling motion and climbing straight up.
interesting points: The object was about the size of an automobile and made a whirring sound., It climbed straight up while moving to the north and east., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes and was recorded by ground radar., The object was described as round, approximately 12 to 15 feet in diameter and aluminum in color., No air traffic was reported in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Mr. R.E.G., a local Neosho businessman, age 50
